scripts.assets: cp -R src/assets dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.pwa: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/js/sw.js dist/ && npm run miniJs:sw
scripts.js:sw: npm run js:sw:dev && npm run miniJs:registersw
scripts.miniJs: npm run miniJs:registersw && npm run miniJs:sw
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist dist/js dist/css dist/recipes
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'src/js/registersw.js' -- npm run js:sw && onchange 'src/js/sw.js' -- npm run pwa
scripts.watch: npm run watch:hbs & npm run watch:assets
scripts.html: npm run handlebars && npm run html:mini
scripts.build: npm run clean && cp CNAME dist/ && npm run html && npm run css && npm run assets && npm run js && npm run pwa
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run handlebars && npm run css && npm run assets && npm run js:dev && npm run pwa
